item.title: Service Catalog
item.description: Service Catalog is a project in the CNCF ecosystem that allows administrators to create a marketplace of services to be installed then allows users of the platform to easily install and “bind” those services to their applications. On the back side, it’s using the Open Service Broker API (OSBA) to allow for provisioning any services that have a broker created (or you can build your own if you want!). This means that you can pick from several off the shelf solutions based on the OSBA specification.
